1393.name: Total Taxes (ICTD)
1393.description: Total revenue from social contributions, direct and indirect taxes, as share of national GDP.

source.name: ICTD
source.dataPublishedBy: International Centre for Tax and Development
source.dataPublisherSource: OECD Revenue Statistics; OECD Latin American Tax Statistics; IMF Government Finance Statistics (GFS); IMF Article IV Staff Reports; CEPALSTAT Revenue Statistics in Latin America.
source.additionalInfo: This data comes from the 'merged' dataset provided by ICTD, after excluding observations flagged as unreliable. Specifically, we excluded the observations classified by ICTD as “Not Credible” or of “Questionable Analytical Comparability”. Details regarding these flags, as well as the dataset more generally, are available Prichard, W. (2016). Reassessing Tax and Development Research: A New Dataset, New Findings, and Lessons for Research. World Development, 80, 48-60.
